title: John distracted by sounds of traffic in new city

content.question: John moves to a new job in a large urban area. For the first few days, John is continuously distracted by the sounds of traffic and street noise. By the end of the first week, John barely notices the sounds of the city. Which of the following has occurred?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
